direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods modify the state of the map by removing elements, though clear removes all elements while remove removes a specific one.
Both methods involve state changes in the map and handle potential exceptions similarly.
Both methods handle exceptions related to unsupported operations and class cast issues similarly.
Both methods access and modify the internal array of maps, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify the internal state of the CompositeMap by altering the array of composited maps.

enhanced_by.reason: Adding composited maps can set up the state for testing the clear method.
Adding elements to the map before clearing it can help verify the clear method's functionality.
Checking if the map is empty after calling clear can verify the method's effectiveness.
